alert.note: Alert for Southern Bristol (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 18 at 3:34PM EST until December 18 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.7 to 4.5 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Southern Bristol MA County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
